memberdef.argsstring: (const char *portName, const char *driverPort, int maxBuffers, size_t maxMemory, int priority, int stackSize)
memberdef.name: SpecsAnalyser

briefdescription.para: Task to listen to the SPECS prodigy application and update the higher level software.

detaileddescription.para: This function runs the polling thread. It is started in the class constructor and must not return until the IOC stops.

memberdef.argsstring: (asynUser *pasynUser, char *strings[], int values[], int severities[], size_t nElements, size_t *nIn)
memberdef.name: readEnum

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynEnum->read().

detaileddescription.para:
The base class implementation simply prints an error message.
pasynUser
- pasynUser structure that encodes the reason and address.
strings
- Array of string pointers.
values
- Array of values
severities
- Array of severities
nElements
- Size of value array
nIn
- Number of elements actually returned

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynInt32->write().

detaileddescription.para: Write integer value to the drivers parameter table.

parameterdescription.para: - Pointer to the asyn user structure.

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynFloat64->write().

detaileddescription.para: Write integer value to the drivers parameter table.

parameterdescription.para: - Pointer to the asyn user structure.

detaileddescription.para: This validation must take place before a new acquisition can begin. The values defined for the acquisition can actually be altered by the validation so the read back values are written back into the parameters.

briefdescription.para: Define a Fixed Analyser Transmission spectrum.

detaileddescription.para: All of the desired parameters should have already been set, this method constructs the required command string from those parameters and sends it to the device.

briefdescription.para: Define a Snapshot Fixed Analyser Transmission spectrum.

detaileddescription.para: All of the desired parameters should have already been set, this method constructs the required command string from those parameters and sends it to the device.

briefdescription.para: Send the start command to the analyser.
Method for sending a simple command (no parameters) that will check the error status and do the right thing.
This method queries the analyser for its device name to populate the ADModel parameter.
This method sets up the analyser parameters that are not known prior to connecting to the device.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::map< std::string, std::string > data, const std::string &name, int &value)
memberdef.name: readIntegerData

memberdef.argsstring: (std::map< std::string, std::string > data, const std::string &name, double &value)
memberdef.name: readDoubleData

briefdescription.para: Send the GetSpectrumDataInfo method to query the spectrum metadata.

detaileddescription.para: Currently only OrdinateRange is supported, which gives us the units and min/max of the non-energy axis. This method is new in protocol version 1.11 so in earlier versions we expect to receive an error message.

parameterdescription.para: - Data Info parameter to request. Currently (v1.11) only OrdinateRange is supported.

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *port, int addr, asynUser **ppasynUser, const char *inputEos, const char *outputEos)
memberdef.name: asynPortConnect

briefdescription.para: Connect to the underlying low level Asyn port that is used for comms.

detaileddescription.para: This uses the asynOctetSyncIO interface, and also sets the input and output terminators.

parameterdescription.para: - Name of the port to connect to.
- Pointer to the asyn user structure.

briefdescription.para: This sends a command to the device and parses the response.

detaileddescription.para:
Data is returned in a std::map that is indexed by the parameter name
command
- String command to send.
response
- String response back (OK or ERROR)
data
- Map of data items indexed by name

briefdescription.para: Utility function, returns strings with unwanted characters stripped.

parameterdescription.para: - string parameter, the string to clean up, returned by reference
- string parameter containing the set of characters to strip from str
- integer parameter to control where characters are stripped - 1 to strip from start, 2 to strip from end, 0 to do both.
